descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][color=#e06666][size=5]Miscellaneous Patches and Tweaks for Perkus Maximus (Perma)[/size][/color][/font][/center]
[color=#6fa8dc][u][b]Current Mod List[/b][/u][/color]

[size=4][color=#741B47]UPDATE - All patches and mods below are fully updated for version 1.2 of Perkus Maximus (Perma) and PCaPP 2.4.3[/color][/size]

[color=#c27ba0][size=4][b]Perma Gold[/b][/size][/color]
Gold and Lockpicks are weightless.  Do NOT clean with TES5Edit.  Identical to Master records are essential to make the mod function correctly!  NEW in Version 1.1: Added PerkusMaximus_Thief.esp as a master so that it would get sorted correctly by LOOT. If using Clothing and
Clutter Fixes then place this mod after PatchusMaximus.esp in your load order (will require a manual sorting rule in LOOT or BOSS).


[color=#c27ba0][size=4][b]Perma Patches and Tweaks[/b][/size][/color]

[list][*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Gold and Lockpicks are weightless (Perma Gold included)
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2] Changes 'Ranged Wpns' to 'Marksmanship'[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Fixes 'Ranged' display when using Extended UI[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Reduced armor effectiveness by 20% (changed armorscalingfactor from 0.10 to 0.08) - Armor ratings were too high in Perma with a 90% max rating - didn't change any of that just lowered overall effectiveness of each armor point to compensate - i.e. armor now stops 20% less damage per armor point[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Agile Defender & Juggernaut legacy perks reduced to 8% per perk rank to keep NPCs (using legacy perks) from having insanely high armor ratings - rank 1 is 8% - rank 5 is 40% armor rating bonus (8% per rank)[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Enchanter perks (2) are 50% more effective now - Enchanting was nerfed a bit too much in Perma - better balanced now[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Disarming Charisma perks (2) now work/take effect if wearing at least one piece of expensive jewelry also[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Thick Padding wasn't working properly and lowered incoming damage by 75% on more than just the first attack.  Changed the damage reduction to 15% to compensate for better balance[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Defiant Concentration perks (2) now lower spell magnitude by 50% instead of 70% - the perks are worth taking now[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]Regenerate Health, Magicka, and Stamina potions (vendor and crafted) have their durations increased from 1 minute to 3 minutes[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]The following spell types had their duration increased from 1 minute to 3 minutes:  Conjuration/Summoning, Courage, Rally, and Cloak Spells[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]The following spell types had their duration increased from 1 minute to 6 minutes:  Magelight, Candlelight, and Armor Spells (wore off way too fast in Perma)[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]2.1 - Small changes to bring it in line with the latest version of Perma and PCaPP[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]2.1 - Updated a few of the Perk descriptions based on my changes
[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]2.1 - Restored several Daedric artifacts and unique items to their correct and former glory - Rueful Axe, Mace of Molag Bal, Ebony Blade, and Spellbreaker[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]2.2 - Small update to [/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=2]bring it in line with the latest version of Perma and PCaPP[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list]Do not clean with TES5Edit. Mod must be placed [color=#ff7700][b]AFTER[/b][/color] PatchusMaximus.esp in your load order in order to be effective!  Warrior and Thief modules required.  Extended UI required.


[color=#c27ba0][size=4][b]Post Perma PatchusMaximus Giants AI Fix[/b][/size][/color]
This patch fixes several AI bugs with Giants when using Perma. Fixes Giants fleeing when attacked bug. Also fixes the club sound to use blunt instead of blade. Small improvements to Giants to make them tougher and more deadly (realistic). Mod must be placed [color=#ff7700][b]AFTER[/b][/color] PatchusMaximus.esp in your load order for it to work properly! New: Updated to include the latest PCaPP and Perma version/changes. Patch not needed if not using Perma.  PCaPP is optional and not required for this mod to work, although recommended. PCaPP fixes this bug in versions 1.8 or newer for most players.  Regardless, players can still use this mod if they want tougher giants.  Mod not needed/required if using Animal Tweaks 2.0 or newer.

Version 1.5 - Fixed the Giant aggression issue (was too aggressive).  You can no longer stagger lock giants.  This will most likely be the final release.
Version Final - Updated to match my new Combat Evolved and Animal Tweaks mod

I found several bugs with Giants when using Skyrim Immersive Creatures with Perma.  Sent the fixes to Raulfin to include in the next version of PCaPP (PCaPP 2.3 or newer).
